content.rendered:
Directed by Hugh Pearson. James Brickell. Parker Brown. George Pagliero. Susie Povey. Will West

Written by Matt Thompson

Cast Bertie Gregory( Self – Host5 episodes, 2022 ). Leigh Hickmott( Self – Whale Biologist1 episode, 2022 ). Dan Beecham( Self – Underwater Cinematography1 episode, 2022 ). Thandiwe Mweetwa( Self – Zambian Carnivore Programme1 episode, 2022)

Language English

Producers Vanessa Berlowitz. James Brickell. Ashley Lorenzo Feldman. Janet Han Vissering. Drew Jones. Sue Doody. Matt Fletcher. Breanna Hoepner. Anwar Mamon. Hugh Pearson. Will West

Production National Geographic.

Certificate 12+

Season 1

Episodes 5
